transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Avesh ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan, boliye sir.
Customer: Haan sir Abhishek baat kar raha hu main aap se.
Executive: Haan, haan boliye boliye.
Customer: Aap se kal baat hui thi na, aap se lunch ke baad connect karne ke liye lekin aap se
Executive: Main call karta hu aapko thodi der mein.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wanted to connect after lunch.



Resolution:

- Executive said will call shortly.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- connect, call
